  • Constructor Details

    • InvFourier

      public InvFourier(int size, int idx)
      Create a Fourier gate with the given size (dimensions), starting at idx
      Parameters:
      size - number of qubits affected by this gate
      idx - the index of the first qubit in the circuit affected by this gate
